Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{3: 'The man who just sold you licorice and twisters realizes your threat to the ritual. His body begins to undergo a terrible transformation, and so does everyone else around him.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{3: 'They shed their skins, exposing their bio-robotic bodies. Even their sizes start to change—the fat ones become fatter, and the skinny ones get even slimmer.'}
{3: 'They change as you start charging, and now you find yourselves amidst a confrontation.'}
{3: 'Many of them are significantly damaged by you, but they still manage to block you from the few that remain in human form, who are still keeping the ritual running.'}
{3: 'A dark mist begins to appear. It still needs a catalyst to display its true form, which the cultists are about to provide.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You are not going to succeed!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I don't have a clear shot!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Take this then—', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Ayla swings her scythe hard, tossing it toward the ritual.'}
{3: 'The scythe spins over everyone, flying directly into the dark mist—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'naaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa—', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tom', 3: 'naaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After absorbing the unexpected catalyst, the mist begins to take shape.'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'Your trivial damage cannot stop the God...! Our lord will arrive soon!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The chaotic mist forms a shell, which then turns into skin and flesh.'}
{3: 'And then, something arrives—'}
{3: 'Everyone has their eyes wide open, staring at it.'}
{3: 'It has a square shape with three layers, emitting a strange smell. It is—'}
{3: 'A bacon sandwich.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "You had a point, but Purple Peony wasn't simply a weapon. She is a piece of art that I put my soul in, you know?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "So it's completely normal for it to turn into my favorite bacon sandwich, don't you think?", 4: '3'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'NAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA—', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Starting from the shop owner, all the ritual participants that are still standing start to scream.'}
{3: 'Just like always, they then turn into ashes.'}
{3: 'But no metal plate can be found this time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hey, can I talk to the designer? There's no consistency in player experience!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Your performance was way too good, even the narrator was rendered speechless. He has almost forgotten the one and only purpose—'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "There is no metal plate, because I'd like to tell you the good news myself. You have proven yourselves and do not need a letter of invitation."}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Instead, the last test will be available whenever you are ready, students.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Keep up the good performance, and Director Toro will be satisfied. The winner from you will take over his legacy.'}
{3: 'After the narration, you find an ordinary wooden door in front of you.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You have plenty of time to prepare before entering the final door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I see. I know what this is all about!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "This must be the final exam of Camp Inferno. The only problem is... No students were ever able to pass all the tests. That's why Camp Inferno got discontinued...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Director Toro never got to retire after that. He had been working on films until he passed away during the shooting of "Final Escape 2"...', 4: '1'}
